mapper.select: select * from (select tmp.*, rownum rn from ( SELECT sd.*, to_char(a.attendance_start_time, 'HH24:MI') startTime, to_char(a.attendance_end_time, 'HH24:MI') endTime, a.attendance_work_state, a.work_time, a.attendance_start_time from staff_department sd INNER JOIN att_record a on sd.staff_id = a.attendance_staff_id )TMP) where rn between #{rownumStart} and #{rownumEnd}

choose.when: and attendance_start_time between to_date(#{beginMade} || ' ' || '00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(#{endMade} || ' ' || '23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
